name: Untitled Dashing Game
description: A little mobile game I was working on. Here you can only dash to move. At the start you can only dash to defeat enemies. But after opening a few chests you can find some power-ups that will help you. The higher the level the harder it gets. But you can upgrade your player in the menu. The game is available on android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SmallDevStudio.DashingGame
